msbt.message: ! Hey. I've been waiting for ya! I wanted to say goodbyeAnd thanks for the advice when I couldn't decide if I wanted to move or not. It meant a lot to me!

Thanks for listening to me talk about moving yesterday!I'm all packed up and ready to go! But I've been waiting for you.On TV, nobody says "goodbye."<10_4 /> Well, unless it's a real sad movieNo, what TV folks do is they smileand they say, "I'll see ya later!"So that's why<10_4 /> ! I'll see ya later!
Hey, . Look! I'm all ready to move out now!Are you here to see me off?Aw, ! I'm gonna miss ya!
Hey, ! Sorry everything is so messy! I'm packing up to move!Oh, right, I didn't tell you yet. I'm moving out tomorrow!I dunno where I'm going yet, but I guess I'm about to find out!
Huh? A new face! I don't know you, but I'm !I used to live on this island, but I'm moving out tomorrow. is a real neat place, but I wanna travel the world!
Hey, it's ! You came to visit again!I can't play right now, though! I'm getting ready to move!I dunno where I'm going yet. I'm just gonna walk on a plane and see where it takes me!
Come to my island!
Good luck...

Oh, hey, ! Didja come to visit again?Sorry, I can't hang out right now. I'm busy getting ready to move!Dunno where I'm going, but once I get there, I'll know I'm there.And if I'm not there, wellI'll still be somewhere. If I'm not somewhere, I'll be nowhere! And that's always neat.Nowhere's the dark place where everybody but me goes to sleep for a couple hours, or days, or whatever.Then the lights come on and we're all somewhere again!I hope me and you'll be in the same somewhere again one day, and we can hang out, 'cause you're neat!
Uhhh Have we met before? I'm ! Nice to meet you!I know we just met, but I'm moving tomorrow! That's right, I'm leaving this island!Huh huh, of course, I still need to decide where I'm moving to!
Aw, thanks, .I think I'm gonna follow the clouds for now.I've always wanted to see where they go after they blow away!
Oh yeeeaah, I got some news!<10_4 /> I'm gonna move to !Pretty surprising, huh? You gotta come visit if you ever wanna share some snacks!
I'm gonna shove all my snacks, and my bug friends, and my memories of this island in a sackAnd I'm gonna go have an adventure!
A huh huh! Starting tomorrow, I get to live on the same island as you again, !Snacks! Hide-and-seek! Treasure hunts! Bug-Offs! Snacks! Fishing Tourneys! It's all possible again!
I think it's real neat we're gonna be neighbors! I can't wait to move to !
Starting tomorrow, I'm gonna be living on !You should come visit the new me sometime, !
I found a spot where I spilled some juice, then hid it under my couch. Ya can't hide anything forever!
Snacks?! Where'd I put my snacks?! That's what I'd yell if I didn't have 32 bags of snacks on me right now.
I hope the new island has a buncha yummy foods too! I'm gonna put everything I find in my mouth!

I love this island, but I feel like I oughta explore. Like the wind.I saw a thing on TV about the wind.Did you know the wind goes all over the world?<10_4 /> I didn't know that.I wanna know what else I don't know. So I'm gonna be like the wind and explore the world!Maybe someday I'll come back and tell you what I learned.<10_4 /> Bye, !
How about my island?
Hmm...

Yeah? Your island is , right?Ya know, it'd be pretty fun hanging out together againâ€”snacks and treasure hunts and everything else!OK! I'm gonna go visit your Resident Services and see if I can move in!
You live on , huh?I've heard that place is a blast!OK! I'm gonna talk to your Resident Services and ask if I can move there!
Yeahhh. It's not gonna be so easy to find a good island, huh?No worries! I'll roam around the world until I find somewhere with yummy food!
Thanks for waiting! I asked Resident Services on , and they said I can move there! Yaaay! Starting tomorrow, we're neighbors, !Let's hang out every day! And talk to bugs! And eat snacks!
Thanks for waiting! I asked Resident Services on , andThey said the island is full and can't fit me in!It's a shame, but OK. I hope we get to live on the same island one day!
Thanks for waiting! I asked Resident Services on , andThey said there's no more space to build new houses!Total downer. Oh well! I still hope we get to live on the same island one day!
Your island must be a really fun place if it has too many new friends to add more!It's a shame I can't move in, but I hope we get to meet again!
Man, your island almost has a city if it has so many houses that it can't fit more!Ah, well. No worries! Thanks for inviting me! I hope we get to snack someday!
Maybe I'll ask one more time? They might say, "Come on over!" this time, .
Good idea!
I dunno...
Yeah, maybe not. If they had room for me, they would've said so!
